channel.title: Kongkast - Hong Kong's Drum and Bass / Dubstep Podcast
channel.itunes:author: www.Kongkretebass.com
channel.description: Kongkast is Hong Kong's drum and bass / dubstep podcast featuring new, old and unreleased tunes from around the World. The sessions are recorded weekly at the Kongkretebass HQ in Hong Kong and hosted by DJ Wash. Special episodes by guest DNB artists from the Asian/Oceanic region and beyond are a regular feature. Occasionally dipping into other genres such as Breaks, Hip Hop, Reggae and more... Thanks for listening in! DJ Wash and Kongkretebass
channel.itunes:subtitle: Kongkretebass KongKast - Hong Kong's very own up front Drum and Bass / Dubstep Music Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Kongkast is Hong Kong's drum and bass / dubstep podcast featuring new, old and unreleased tunes from around the World. item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
Bass Flo - Bass Flo is one of the most talented, young and raw acts to come out the UK, specialising in Jungle, Drum and Bass, Asian Underground and Ambient Chill. Bass Flo's musical game plan is united with the talent and ability to showcase his distinctive flow and rhythm when making and playing music. Since the tender age of 13, Dhol Foundation and Made Of Music, who are the UKs most well known and professional musicians, have taught Bass Flo the history of Asian music culture, the theory of beats as well as the ability and skills to accomplish his goal.

item.title: kongkast_50 - DJ Steppa [PROPAGANDA RECORDINGS, UK] - BEST BREAKTHROUGH DJ (NATIONAL DnB AWARDS 2007)
item.itunes:author: www.kongkretebass.com
item.itunes:subtitle: www.kongkretebass.com - Very Exclusive Studio Mix by DJ Steppa (Leeds, UK)
item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
This week's KONGKAST we got a very special and exclusive mix by the The winner of the Best BreakThrough DJ (National DnB Awards 2007, UK).
DJ Steppa (Propraganda Recordings, 3rd Angle, Blueprint and Radius Recordings)
This Leeds based DJ is no stranger to big stages and big raves with previous special guest spots at Bryan Gees long running Movement, and a Stars of the Future residency at then Terry Turbos legendary One Nation, a promotion that entrusted him with main room duties at the colossal Brixton Academy, sharing the main stage with some of the biggest names in the scene.
Right now, he works exclusively with the two biggest events in his hometown namely Metropolis and Sudbub, with the latter of the two being predominantly a Reggae event whereby Steppa plays host to Drum and Bass in Room 2.
This is one mix you DON'T WANT TO MISS!
Check out DJ Steppa's Website and Myspace for more information.
www.myspace.com/djsteppa www.djsteppa.co.uk/
Track Listing - DJ Steppa, UK - PROPAGANDA RECORDINGS
1) Heist - Ambush - Co-Lab 2) Taxman - Scan Darker - Ganja 3) Chase AND Status - Hurt You - Ram 4) Original Sin - Cheater Cheater - Ganja 5) Clipz - Download (VIP) - Audio Zoo 6) Hazard AND D-Minds - Mr Happy - Playaz 7) Dillinja - Make It Work - Valve 8) Clipz - Rubbish (VIP) - Audio Zoo 9) Friction - 3rd Degree Gurns - Valve 10) Original Sin - Don't Be Silly - Ganja 11) High Contrast - If We Ever - Hospital 12) Lynx - Disco Dodo - Creative Source 13) Friction AND Nu-Balance - Robocop (Taxman Remix) - Playaz 14) Steppa AND Kitcha - The Business - Propaganda

item.title: kongkast_51 - Big Bud Live at Kongkretebass [SoundTrax Recordings, UK] - Live recordings from Kongkretebass Presents: Big Bud [UK]
item.itunes:author: www.kongkretebass.com
item.itunes:subtitle: www.kongkretebass.com - Exclusive Live recordings from our recent event - Kongkretebass Presents: BIg Bud [UK]
item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
Happy Chinese New Year to all our kongkast listeners from around the world! Last month, we have had over 2000 downloads of our Kongkast! SO big up your self for tunning in and supporting the music you love!
This week, Kongkretebass Kongkast brings you a Live recordings from our recent Big Bud gig! Was a hugh success with BIg Bud playing some of the best Rolling Drum and Bass Hong Kong has heard in a long time! No doubt Big Bud will be back again after this awesome end to his long tour of Australia and New Zealand.
And because it's The New Year, we've got some Give-aways!
Send and email to info[at]kongkretebass.com for your chance to get a copy of an compilation done by some of the finest in Australian, all presented by one of the best known Crew/BBQs in Sydney, The ForeignDub Presents: DnBBQ Compilation #2! This compilation is full of exclusive tunes by Australian and New Zealand Artists, ranging from Drum and Bass, Dub, Grime, Hip Hop and plenty more! From artist such as Big Bud, Budspells, Rastawookie, Vice Versa and much more!
Limited copies are availible for give away, So hit us up for your chance to grab a copy!

item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
This week, we got a special preview mix for RADAR #3 @ TwystMind.
DJ Shawn Livewire gives us an heavy little mix with tunes by Break, Nymfo and Icicle, Zero T, Cause 4 Concern and much more. A good showcase for whats coming next week @ RADAR #3! Stay Tuned!
Don't forget to come and join us for RADAR#3 @ TwystMind on Saturday, 17th May to catch Shawn Livewire, The Project (Live) and Violent Jokes (Live)! For more details, please check to go www.kongkretebass,com See you at the party!

kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
KONGKAST goes regional with an exclusive and summery dnb guest mix by TWINHED (Setup, Altered Statesmen) who is based in Singapore. Twinhed runs Setup, a local dnb night, and is one half of producer duo Altered Statesmen.
Listen in to see how he rolls out Drum and Bass in Asias Lion City!

Track list - Kongkast #62 ft. Twinhed (Altered Statesmen/ Singapore)
1.) Mutt - Training Suite 2.) Erykah Badu - Bad Lady (Dune rmx) 3.) Calibre - In the blink of an eye 4.) Missy Elliott Work It (Artificial Intelligence Rmx) 5.) Alix Perez / MC Fats - Fingerclick 6.) Dan Marshall - Crazy 7.) London Elektricity - ? 8.) Cybass - Floating dreams 9.) Lynx - BBox roller 10.) Atlantic Connection - Brooklyn 11.) Straight from the bedroom - (white) 12.) ? - (white) 13.) The green man - (white)
About Twinhed: Justin, AKA Twinhed, has been living in Singapore for over 4 years now, originally starting out as a DJ at legendary UK rave/hardcore spot The Dungeons in Londons East End back in 89.
He has toured and lived in countries such as France, Switzerland, the U.S, Japan, Germany and Italy, before touching down in South East Asia
Whilst in Italy, he set up FleXuouS; Inna Brazillion-jungle style, nominated best Italian DnB evening. He was also nominated best DJ in the Italian DnB scene. Granted residency at CS Leoncavallo alongside the likes of Total Science, Storm, Em and Delroy. He has also held it down at venues Pergola, Paolo Pini, The Black, Teatro Ventaglio Nazionale and Killer Plastic. Represented the city of Milan at the Italian DnB convention in Reggio Emilia playing alongside guests Andy C and MC Dynamite and toured the U.S with LTJ Bukem as part of the Good Looking experience.
Since arriving in Singapore four years ago, he has had a great time playing with the local Guerrilla crew at Home Club - sharing the dex with DJs Clart, Doc Scott, Escobar, Has, Kable, Kastro, Kiat, Lynx, NuTone, Makoto, Mission Control, Rendie, Submerge and Utah Jazz.
Two years ago, Twinhed has launched his own drum and bass night, Setup, and has formed the production duo Altered Statesmen with Toby Best.
www.myspace.com/alteredstatesmon

item.title: Kongkast 63 - RIDO (Czech Republic) in the mix for Kongkretebass
item.itunes:author: www.kongkretebass.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Kongkast 63 - RIDO (Czech Republic) in the mix for Kongkretebass
item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
This week on KONGKAST, a very special guest mix by Rido (Defcom recordings, Intersection rec., DSC14, Citrus/ Czech Republic). One of the most promising up and coming artist from Czech Republic, an audio engineer with a unique sound in Drum and Bass. With most recent signing on Citrus and DSC14, his music is well and truly Heavy!
Track list - Kongkast #63 ft. RIDO (Defcom recordings, Intersection rec., DSC14, Citrus/ Czech Republic)
1/Rido Coincident_ DSCI4 2/Rido and NoMoney and Evancipation Tread Softly N/A 3/Morebeat and Kantyze Alchemy_Industry rec. 4/Rido New Hope_Defcom rec. 5/BSE The End of Me_BSE rec. 6/Nocturnal and Prolix Bad Blood_Ganja Tek. 7/Rido Somber World_Defcom rec. 8/Noisia and BSE Infusion_Vision rec. 9/Morebeat Colours_Citrus rec. 10/Brooklyn With All My Heart/Rido RMX/_N/A 11/B-Complex Spirit_N/A 12/Catacomb Bloodmuscle_SMPT rec. 13/Dose Eye to Eye_Syndromaudio rec 14/High Contrast If We Ever_Hospital rec. 15/Ritual and Spikey Tee Soul Lullaby Vip_N/A 16/Rido Life is Strange_Fokuz ltd. 17/Rido Hard as Life_Citrus 035
About Rido -
Rido (aka Pavel Ridosko) is a rapidly up and coming producer hailing from Prague.
He was initially drawn to electronic music after being exposed to the heavy beats of the popular UK outfit The Prodigy. In 2004 he moved to Sydney to study sound engineering at SAE. After he returned to Prague, he started to concentrate on making music full-time.
His first international release was on Intersection recordings with tunes Dark Thief and Density. His next release was called Anatomy and was featured on an EP from the German label, Shadybrain. After this he released a soulful tech slammer, featuring the vocals of Spikey Tee, called Life is Strange, for the Holland based Fokuz recordings.
However, when Kryptic Minds and Leon Switch listened to Ridos Strangers, Ridos career began to rapidly accelerate. The tune was signed without hesitation to Defcom Recordings and Rido joined the Defcom crew without looking back. His new tunes Somber World and New Hope are to be released on Defcom in the beginning of 2008.
There are couple forthcoming releases from Rido in 2008 one called Coincidence for legendary DSCI4 and colab single with Czech fellow producers Morebeat coming out on Citrus recordings, with tunes Hard as Life and colab with Morebeat called Project Icarus.
Ridos uniquely deep and technical sound is influenced both by the futuristic aspects of contemporary dnb and by his passion for orchestral and film music. His tunes are played by Djs such as Teebee, Noisia, Kryptic Minds,Nocturnal and many more.
http://www.myspace.com/ridojunglist

item.itunes:author: www.kongkretebass.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Kongkast 65 - by DOSE (New Zealand) in the mix for Kongkretebass
item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
This week on KONGKAST, a very special guest mix by DOSE (Revolution, Citrus, Samurai Music, Commercial Suicide/ New Zealand). Dose is an ascending talent in the NZ Drum and Bass scene. An active DJ and producer for the last 6 years, his cleverly crafted sets and original tracks are turning heads around the globe, from fellow performers, listeners and labels alike.
Track list - Kongkast #65 ft. DOSE (Revolution, Citrus, Samurai Music, Commercial Suicide/ New Zealand)
Dose and Menace - Pick up - Samurai music lp Break - Genesis - Symmetry Psidream - crossed off - Melting pot Dose- Think straight - Syndrome audio LP SKC - Offgaurd vip - Commercial Suicide Commix - talk to frank (Break rmx) Mayhem - Ignition - SLR Mindscape -the vulture (Dose and Meneace rmx) - Syndrome audio Vicious circle - Rollers convention - Phobia and Jubai- Guillitine - ? c4c and Fierce - BErmuda - Quarentine Dose and Trei - Hot foot - Critical Lomax - innocent x - Critical Icicle feat Nymfo - Green goblin - Crunch Cern and Charlie B - Sticks n stones - Renegade Hardware Sabre - eye contact - Renegade Hardware Break and - Dog soldier - DnAUDIO Dose - Can you see - Critical System - Near miss - Digital soundboy State of mind and Trei - Dirt - SOM MUSIC Spektrum - Hotsteppa (Bulletproof RMX) ? Dose back to normal - ? Black sun empire -Crash bunny (Dose rmx) - Citrus LP Trei - Justify - Commercial Suicide Break - liveevil - Levitated Bulletproof and Survival - Black rose - Revolution Teknik and Menace - Rise and Fall Dose - No excuse - Critical Bulletproof,Cern and Teknik - Scatter the Ashes - Cyanide
About DOSE: Dose is an ascending talent in the NZ Drum and Bass scene. An active DJ and producer for the last 6 years, his cleverly crafted sets and original tracks are turning heads around the globe, from fellow performers, listeners and labels alike.
Doses tunes are being supported by the best in the business at home, with The Upbeats, Bulletproof, State of Mind, and Concord Dawn dropping his sounds into their sets. International heavyweights are also paying close attention, with the likes of Andy C, Pendulum, Ed Rush and Optical, Black Sun Empire and Klute (to name a few) playing Dose tracks, cementing his place as an emerging leader in NZ Drum and Bass production.
September 2006 saw Optiv, of Cause 4 Concern, sign Doses Derailed, and also request that Dose complete a 12-inch release for Red Light Records. A wave of interest followed, and since, Dose has secured releases on labels such as Revolution, Syndrome Audio, Cyanide, Citrus, Samurai Music, Full Force Music and notably, a 12-inch release on Klutes Commercial Suicide imprint.
More recently, Andy C included Dose,Trei and Menace..s track Valium Express on Mixmag Mix CD, reaching an audience of more than 40,000 fans worldwide.
In 2007, Dose performed a five-date tour of Australia, gathering a passionate response from both new and seasoned fans. This year, Dose has already impressed audiences around NZ, touring with fellow DJ/Producer Trei, in celebration of their Samurai Music release NZ004
Plans for the remainder of 2008 see Dose booked to revisit Australia, before he embarks on a full EU/UK circuit in November. For full tour updates and details, see www.myspace.com/nzdose
Watch out for forthcoming releases from Dose on Syndrome Audio, Commercial Suicide and Critical Music.
http://www.myspace.com/nzdose

About Displaced: Displaced was originally born in New Zealand then moved to London in 2004, following a Drum and Bass dream. Displaced is the Label owner at Ruse Records and co-organizer of the renowned This Way Up events in London, an event show casing the highest up and coming and established artists; and as with the label; primarily pushing the sounds of neurofunk.
Keeping busy, Displaced set up the This Way Up Artist Agency based in London, UK the agency manages a high quality roster of Drum and Bass and Dubstep artists. Displaced comes from a diverse musical back ground, formerly a singer in a heavy metal band, yet heavily into gangster rap, hip hop and everything from jazz to opera. Displaced has recently been learning production, so you may expect to hear some of his tunes in the near future.

item.itunes:author: www.kongkretebass.com
item.itunes:subtitle: KONGKAST#90 - feat. TRUTH (Deep Medi Musik, Disfigured Dubs, Aquatic Lab/ NZ )
item.itunes:summary:
kongkretebass.com - Weekly Podcast with the best DnB tunes from around the world!
Kongkretebass KONGKAST#90 - feat. TRUTH (Deep Medi Musik, Disfigured Dubs, Aquatic Lab/ NZ )
Kongkretebass KONGKAST #90 is Here! This week on Kongkast, we bring you one of the biggest Dubstep production trio from New Zealand - TRUTH (Deep Medi Musik, Disfigured Dubs, Aquatic Lab/ NZ )! A special Preview exclusive mix for thier upcoming "FATMAN TOUR" soon to be experienced here in Hong Kong!
Kongkretebass and HEAVY Presents: TRUTH (Deep Medi /NZ) - FATMAN TOUR 2009, Saturday, 27th June 2009, in Hong Kong!
With releases on Deep Medi Musik, Disfigured Dubs and Aquatic Lab, Truth has made a big impact in the Dubstep scene with their bassline riddims. Their music has been supported by some of the biggest names in the scene including Mala, Skream, Benga, Mary Anne Hobbs, Hijack, Joe Nice, Emalkay, DMZ and Goth Trad to name a few.
Check out Event page on Facebook for The Truth Fatman Tour @ Hong Kong http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=92276776603 http://kongkretebass.com/kkblog/?p=838
We send our thanks to TRUTH for bringing this special mix to our listeners of KONGKAST - Hong Kongs podcast for dnb and dubstep.
